author: Campo Grande News
title: Procurador do MP usou tr\u00e1fico de influ\u00eancia por decis\u00e3o de desembargador, diz PF
text: Procurador do MP usou tr√°fico de influ√™ncia por decis√£o de desembargador, diz PF Marcos Sottoriva teria negociado liminar com Marcos Brito em lit√≠gio por compra de fazenda feite por ele Al√©m dos membros do Tribunal de Justi√ßa de Mato Grosso do Sul (TJMS) e do Tribunal de Contas do Estado (TCE-MS), um membro do Minist√©rio P√∫blico de Mato Grosso do Sul (MPMS) tamb√©m foi alvo da opera√ß√£o Ultima Ratio. Trata-se do procurador Marcos Ant√¥nio Martins Sottoriva, da 5¬™ Procuradoria da Justi√ßa C√≠vel do MPMS. A Pol√≠cia Federal cumpriu mandado de busca e apreens√£o em endere√ßos ligados a ele. Na decis√£o do Supremo Tribunal de Justi√ßa (STJ), fundamentada pela investiga√ß√£o da Pol√≠cia Federal, Sottoriva aparece sendo favorecido pessoalmente por uma decis√£o do desembargador Marcos Jos√© de Britto no neg√≥cio de uma fazenda comprada pelo procurador em 2020. A investiga√ß√£o da Pol√≠ca Federal teve acesso a mensagens entre Sottoriva e Brito em que o procurador envia ao desembargador o n√∫mero do recurso de agravo de instrumento contra decis√£o de 1¬∫ grau que indeferiu uma liminar em processo ajuizado por ele a respeito da compra de uma fazenda, com valor da causa de R$ 5 milh√µes. A PF diz que sem ao menos ter acessado aos autos, Brito pede a seu assessor para providenciar a elabora√ß√£o de decis√£o liminar, concedendo os efeitos pretendidos por Sottoriva, sem entrar no m√©rito, e assinar a decis√£o. ‚ÄúOs efeitos pretendidos em liminar eram: 1) a suspens√£o da exigibilidade das parcelas vincendas da fazenda comprada pelo procurador de justi√ßa, 2) a manuten√ß√£o dele na posse do im√≥vel rural, at√© a devolu√ß√£o dos valores que pagou, 3) suspens√£o do pagamento de alugu√©is, pelo procurador, quanto a im√≥vel que entregou como parte do pagamento, mas que continua em sua posse, ou autorizar que deposite os alugu√©is em ju√≠zo, 4) devolu√ß√£o, ao procurador, da posse de outros 3 [im√≥veis](https://www.campograndenews.com.br/imoveis-campo-grande-ms) que entregou como parte do pagamento, ou que os r√©us depositem os alugu√©is em ju√≠zo‚Äù, aponta o inqu√©rito. Na decis√£o em que ocorreu o suposto favorecimento consta que Sottoriva requer a resolu√ß√£o do contrato de compra da fazenda porque a China enfrentava grave surto de peste su√≠na africana, o que valorizou a arroba do boi, tornando as presta√ß√µes excessivamente onerosas, porque eram indexadas em tal valor. ‚ÄúVoltando √†s mensagens, Marcos informa para Marcelo assinar a decis√£o. Ou seja, tamb√©m √© extremamente grave a constata√ß√£o de que quem assina a decis√£o n√£o √© o desembargador. [...] Isso, a nosso ver, leva a uma grave conclus√£o: o desembargador n√£o acessou os autos, n√£o elaborou a decis√£o, n√£o a conferiu e nem assinou. Portanto entendemos que a decis√£o judicial √© nula, sendo que a atua√ß√£o dele limitou-se a uma ordem a seu assessor que favorece indevidamente um procurador de justi√ßa‚Äù. Ap√≥s a liminar concedida, procurador agradece a Brito por mensagem. Segundo ele foi fechado um acordo com o vendedor da fazenda. ‚Äú"Gra√ßas a Deus e ao seu trabalho ... acabamos por fechar um acordo ... consegui alongar a d√≠vida em mais uma parcela. Obrigado de cora√ß√£o. Boa P√°scoa na b√™n√ß√£o de Deus e de seu filho Jesus Cristo". O Campo Grande News tentou contato com o procurador, mas at√© o momento n√£o obteve contato. A reportagem tamb√©m pediu um posicionamento do Minist√©rio P√∫blico, que informou n√£o ter sido notificado oficialmente pelos √≥rg√£os de investiga√ß√£o. Farra da publicidade - Em 2008, o MPE (Minist√©rio P√∫blico Estadual), por meio do ent√£o promotor Marcos Antonio Martins Sottoriva, entrou com uma a√ß√£o civil de improbidade administrativa, pedindo repara√ß√£o de danos, em fun√ß√£o de ter sido montado um suposto esquema de desvio de dinheiro p√∫blico na gest√£o de Zeca, por interm√©dio de empresas de publicidade. O imbr√≥glio judicial, chegou a tirar os direitos pol√≠ticos do ex-governador. Nas elei√ß√µes de 2018, Zeca registrou a candidatura para o Senado na Justi√ßa Eleitoral, mas a PRE (Procuradoria Regional Eleitoral) pediu a impugna√ß√£o devido √† condena√ß√£o na Corte Estadual. No entanto a Justi√ßa concedeu medida liminar para que fosse mantido o primeiro julgamento, sem condena√ß√£o por improbidade, at√© a decis√£o dos embargos de declara√ß√£o, parado no STJ sob a relatoria do desembargador. O pr√≥prio Raufi Marques foi exonerado da gest√£o da ent√£o prefeita de D√©lia Razuk, de Dourados, em 2017, onde atuava como secret√°rio de Governo, por conta da condena√ß√£o julgada hoje. Opera√ß√£o - Durante esta manh√£, a Pol√≠cia Federal cumpriu 44 mandados de busca e apreens√£o em Campo Grande (MS), Cuiab√° (MT), Bras√≠lia (DF) e S√£o Paulo (SP). Dentre os investigados h√° desembargadores do TJMS (Tribunal de Justi√ßa de Mato Grosso do Sul), conselheiros do TCE (Tribunal de Contas do Estado) e advogados. Conforme divulgado pela ordem, a comiss√£o ser√° composta pelos conselheiros estaduais: Ana Maria Medeiros como Presidente, Bruno Azambuja e Gustavo Gottardi. O trio ser√° respons√°vel por acompanhar as apura√ß√µes do Superior Tribunal de Justi√ßa. Ao todo, s√£o investigados nove advogados, que dividem sete escrit√≥rios de advocacia em Campo Grande. A maioria dos investigados s√£o filhos dos desembargadores afastados. S√£o investigados Rodrigo e Renata Pimentel (filhos Sideni Pimentel), Marcus Vin√≠cius Machado Abreu e Ana Carolina Abreu (Filhos de Vladimir Abreu), al√©m de Camila Bastos Batoni (filha de Alexandre Bastos) vice-presidente da OAB. Na lista tamb√©m est√£o os advogados Felix Cunha e Everton Barcellos de Souza e Divoncir Schreiner Maran Junior, filho do desembargador, j√° afastado anteriormente, Divoncir Schreiner Maran. F√°bio Castro Leandro, filho do desembargador aposentado Paschoal Leandro, tamb√©m integra a lista, mas o pai n√£o aparece entre os suspeitos. Receba as principais not√≠cias do Estado pelo Whats. [Clique aqui para acessar o canal do Campo Grande News](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va6UwSHHltY8c4OtUb0j) e siga nossas [redes sociais](https://www.tiktok.com/@campograndenews?_t=8jKPysGs6SL&_r=1).

author: Markdave
title: Seven Advantages of Transportable Homes for Today's Lifestyle - AtoAllinks
text: [] Seven Advantages of Transportable Homes for Today‚Äôs Lifestyle [](https://www.atoallinks.com/author/markdave/) [markdave](https://www.atoallinks.com/author/markdave/), [14 mins ago](https://www.atoallinks.com/2024/seven-advantages-of-transportable-homes-for-todays-lifestyle/)6 min read 9 Transportable homes, also known as modular or prefab homes, have gained significant popularity in modern living due to their flexibility, sustainability, and cost-effectiveness. As the demand for adaptable and eco-friendly housing continues to grow, transportable homes have emerged as a practical solution for individuals and families seeking a dynamic and efficient living space. In this blog, we will explore the seven key advantages of transportable homes, shedding light on their unique benefits and suitability for today‚Äôs lifestyle. The concept of [Movable homes Waikato](https://classickinect.nz/waikato/) embodies the essence of modern living, offering a harmonious blend of convenience, style, and functionality. Throughout this discussion, we aim to provide insightful information that will empower readers to make informed decisions about their housing options and discover the numerous advantages that transportable homes can offer. 1. Flexibility and Mobility Transportable homes provide unparalleled flexibility and mobility, allowing individuals to relocate their living space as needed. Whether it‚Äôs pursuing new career opportunities in different locations or simply desiring a change of scenery, the ability to move a home seamlessly offers a level of freedom and adaptability that traditional housing cannot match. This mobility ensures that individuals can maintain a sense of stability and comfort while embracing new opportunities and experiences without the constraints of a fixed location. The convenience of relocating a transportable home without compromising on comfort and quality is a defining factor that appeals to the modern lifestyle. The ability to adapt to changing circumstances and preferences ensures that individuals can create a living space that evolves with their needs, making transportable homes an attractive option for those seeking a dynamic and flexible housing solution. 2. Cost-Effectiveness One of the most significant advantages of transportable homes is their cost-effectiveness compared to traditional housing options. The streamlined construction process and efficient use of materials contribute to potential savings on construction costs, land expenses, and ongoing maintenance. Additionally, the ability to customise the design and features of a transportable home allows individuals to optimise their investment by aligning the home‚Äôs specifications with their budget and lifestyle requirements. By choosing a transportable home, individuals can benefit from a more affordable housing option without compromising on quality or comfort. This financial advantage makes transportable homes an appealing choice for those who value practicality and long-term financial stability in their housing decisions. 3. Sustainable Living In today‚Äôs environmentally conscious society, the sustainable advantages of transportable homes are a compelling reason for their increasing popularity. These homes are designed with a focus on eco-friendly practices, utilising efficient building materials, energy-saving technologies, and sustainable construction methods. The reduced environmental impact of transportable homes aligns with the growing emphasis on sustainable living and responsible resource management. The incorporation of sustainable principles into the design and construction of movable homes Waikato reflects a commitment to environmental stewardship and a desire to minimise the ecological footprint of residential living. By choosing a transportable home, individuals can actively contribute to a more sustainable future while enjoying the benefits of environmentally conscious living. 4. Customisation and Modern Design Transportable homes offer a diverse range of customisation options and modern design features that cater to individual preferences and style preferences. From innovative layouts and contemporary aesthetics to personalised interior and exterior elements, these homes provide a platform for creative expression and tailored living spaces. The flexibility to customise a home according to specific needs and design preferences empowers individuals to create a living environment that truly reflects their personality and lifestyle. The modern design elements integrated into transportable homes encompass the latest architectural trends, functional innovations, and aesthetic enhancements. This emphasis on contemporary design ensures that transportable homes remain at the forefront of modern living, offering a dynamic and visually appealing housing solution for discerning individuals and families. 5. Rapid Construction and Efficiency The efficient construction process of transportable homes sets them apart as a practical and time-saving housing option. Unlike traditional housing construction, which can be prolonged and subject to external factors, transportable homes are built with precision and efficiency in a controlled environment. This streamlined approach to construction results in significantly reduced build times, allowing homeowners to experience rapid occupancy and expedited returns on investment. The efficiency of building transportable homes aligns with the fast-paced nature of modern living, providing individuals with a convenient and timely solution for their housing needs. Whether it‚Äôs for personal residence or investment purposes, the swift construction process of transportable homes offers a compelling advantage in today‚Äôs dynamic and competitive real estate market. 6. Integration of Technology Modern technology plays a pivotal role in the integration of smart solutions within transportable homes, enhancing security systems, energy management, and overall convenience. From automated climate control and energy-efficient appliances to advanced security features and home automation, the seamless integration of technology elevates the functionality and comfort of transportable homes. This technological integration aligns with the digital lifestyle preferences of contemporary homeowners, offering a sophisticated and connected living experience. The incorporation of advanced technology into transportable homes reflects a commitment to convenience, efficiency, and modern living standards. By embracing smart solutions and innovative technologies, transportable homes provide residents with a heightened level of comfort and control over their living environment. 7. Quality Assurance and Durability Addressing common misconceptions about the durability of transportable homes is essential to understanding their reliability and long-term quality. These homes are constructed with high-quality materials, stringent building standards, and adherence to regulatory requirements, ensuring that they are built to last. The emphasis on quality assurance and durability reinforces the long-term investment value of transportable homes and dispels any uncertainties regarding their structural integrity. By highlighting the robust construction and durability of transportable homes, individuals can gain confidence in their decision to choose this housing option. The assurance of quality and longevity further solidifies the attractiveness of transportable homes as a viable and dependable choice for modern living. Conclusion In conclusion, the seven advantages of movable homes Waikato underscore their relevance and suitability for today‚Äôs lifestyle. The flexibility, cost-effectiveness, sustainability, customisation, efficiency, technological integration, and quality assurance of transportable homes collectively contribute to a compelling housing solution that aligns with the dynamic needs and preferences of modern individuals and families. In summary, the rise of transportable homes reflects a shift towards embracing flexibility, sustainability, and efficiency in residential living, offering individuals a pathway to a more dynamic and responsive housing solution. As the landscape of housing options continues to evolve, transportable homes present a compelling opportunity for individuals to embrace a modern lifestyle that prioritises adaptability, creativity, and responsible living practices. Source: [https://medium.com/@classickinectnz/seven-advantages-of-transportable-homes-for-todays-lifestyle-fa42d324e09d](https://medium.com/@classickinectnz/seven-advantages-of-transportable-homes-for-todays-lifestyle-fa42d324e09d)

author: Frontaly
title: El papa pide 'el apoyo renovado de la comunidad internacional' para lograr la paz en Hait√≠ | Acento
text: El papa Francisco inst√≥ este domingo a un "apoyo renovado de la comunidad internacional" para conseguir "la paz y la reconciliaci√≥n" en Hait√≠, donde reinan la violencia y el caos desatados por las bandas armadas, causando varios muertos en los √∫ltimos d√≠as. "Sigo con preocupaci√≥n y dolor la grave crisis que golpea a Hait√≠ y los violentos episodios sucedidos en los √∫ltimos d√≠as. Me siento cercano a la Iglesia y al querido pueblo haitiano, que desde hace a√±os est√° sometido al sufrimiento", dijo el pont√≠fice tras el rezo dominical del √Ångelus en el Vaticano. El papa invit√≥ a "rezar por la intercesi√≥n de la Virgen del Perpetuo Socorro". "Para que cese cualquier clase de violencia y todos ofrezcan su contribuci√≥n para hacer crecer la paz y la reconciliaci√≥n en el pa√≠s con el apoyo renovado de la comunidad internacional", a√±adi√≥. Las bandas armadas mantienen el caos en el pa√≠s, en particular en la capital, Puerto Pr√≠ncipe, que en la noche de este viernes vivi√≥ horas de m√°xima violencia, con intensos tiroteos en varias partes de la ciudad y el intento de atacar el Palacio Nacional, donde los bandidos fueron repelidos por las fuerzas de seguridad, causando varios muertos. Las bandas armadas quisieron atacar instituciones como el Palacio Nacional y el Ministerio de Interior, adem√°s de comisar√≠as u oficinas p√∫blicas y en las redes sociales proliferaron las im√°genes de gente corriendo, en pleno centro de la capital, intentando huir de los tiroteos. Y ello pese a que este jueves se prorrog√≥ por un mes el estado de emergencia y se renov√≥ por cuatro d√≠as el toque de queda en el departamento del Oeste, donde se encuentra Puerto Pr√≠ncipe.

author: @wion
title: Watch: Man rescued 48 km off coast in ‚Äònightmare scenario‚Äô as Hurricane Milton pounded Florida
text: As Hurricane Milton pounded Florida Thursday (Oct 10) with full-throttle intensity, the tale of a rescue mission unfolded far away in the Gulf of Mexico has surprised many. In a scenario described as ‚Äònightmare‚Äô by the emergency crew, a man was rescued 48 km off Florida coast as he helplessly clung to an ice box. The man, whose identity remains unknown, was luckily able to dial the coast guard station in nearby St Petersburg before contact was lost. His fishing vessel had malfunctioned on Wednesday near Madeira Beach, just before the storm made landfall. ‚Äî USCGSoutheast (@USCGSoutheast) [#Breaking]An[@USCG]Air Station Miami 65 helicopter crew rescued a man clinging to a cooler approximately 30 mi. off Longboat Key. The man was taken to Tampa General Hospital for medical care. Sector St. Pete lost communications w/ the man at approx. 6:45 p.m., Wed.[#SAR][pic.twitter.com/64wSHuRAeH][October 10, 2024] [√ó](#) He was spotted and rescued by officials on Thursday, hugging an open cooler chest. A video of the rescue has now gone viral on the internet. ‚ÄúThis man survived in a nightmare scenario for even the most experienced mariner,‚Äù coast guard official Dana Grady said. The man was later taken to Tampa General Hospital for treatment. It was mayhem on Florida streets Thursday (Oct 10) as Hurricane Milton tore through the US state, leaving behind a trail of massive destruction and piles of debris. Government officials said the monster storm left at least 16 people dead, including six in St. Lucie County on Florida's Atlantic coast. More than 11 million people still faced threats of flash and river flooding in the state. At around 11:50 am ET on Thursday, more than 3.4mn people were facing power outages across the counties. Watch: Hurricane Milton Drives Record Insurance Losses in Florida According to estimates, Milton brought a 1-in-1,000-year rainfall to the US state, with the Tampa Bay area being the worst-affected. The monster storm may have caused a loss of up to $50 billion (insured) to Florida property owners, claimed Fitch Ratings on Thursday. The agency added that it would be the largest insured loss since Hurricane Ian in 2022. Coming on the heels of Hurricane Helene two weeks prior, Milton would further push total insured losses for insurers in the state over $100 billion for the fifth straight year, the Fitch analysts wrote. (With inputs from agencies)

author: CBS News
title: 3 arrested in 2 separate church break-ins in South Boston - CBS Boston
text:
SOUTH BOSTON - Three people were arrested in two separate break-ins at churches in South Boston late Wednesday night and early Thursday morning.
The break-ins happened at the old St. Vincent's Church on E Street and St. Monica's Church on Old Colony Avenue.
At St. Vincent's, police said Michael Donovan, 37, and Brendan Delaney, 50, were seen leaving from the church's side door, carrying two bags. Officers detained them and when they searched the bags, they said they found hand tools and several pieces of copper wire they stole from the church. Both men were arrested and charged with possession of burglarious instruments and breaking and entering in the nighttime.
At St. Monica's a few hours later, church security reported the break-in to police, who said they found a large broken window. During a sweep, police said Duke the K-9 located the suspect, 61-year-old Steven Cyr, in the basement. Cyr allegedly gave officers a fake name before his real name was revealed during booking. Cyr was arrested and charged with breaking and entering in the nighttime and furnishing a false name.
More from CBS News Teen among 2 killed in latest Lynn shooting, police call attacks "targeted" Suffolk County House of Corrections inmate dies after "apparent fight" Postal carrier attacked and robbed at gunpoint in Dorchester First Night Boston preparations underway as festivities move to City Hall Plaza Mailman attacked, robbed by 2 masked men in Randolph In: South Boston Church WBZ-News Staff The WBZ News team is a group of experienced journalists who bring you the content on WBZ.com.

 Maranh√£o informou, na √∫ltima quinta (9), o n√∫mero de cidades afetadas pelas chuvas no estado chegaram a 30. Todas est√£o em situa√ß√£o de emerg√™ncia. Ao todo, 1.031 fam√≠lias est√£o desabrigadas e 2.909, desalojadas. Uma pessoa morreu. Ainda segundo a Defesa Civil, o munic√≠pio de Santa In√™s √© o √∫nico em estado de calamidade p√∫blica. As fam√≠lias que foram impactadas est√£o sendo ajudadas pela defesas civis dos munic√≠pios, que informaram que est√£o trabalhando para retirada das pessoas das √°reas de risco. O governo do Maranh√£o tem fornecido refei√ß√µes, por meio da rede de restaurantes populares.
Nas redes sociais, a deputada Erika Hilton usou seu perfil para atualizar sobre as chuvas no estado e pedir ajuda dos internautas. ‚ÄúSe voc√™ mora na regi√£o de S√£o Lu√≠s e tem capacidade de doar, o Shopping Passeio, em parceira com a Cruz Vermelha, est√° arrecadando alimentos n√£o perec√≠veis, cal√ßados e itens de higiene, na campanha SOS Maranh√£o e tamb√©m para a campanha SOS Rio Grande do Sul‚Äù, escreveu ela.
